name: emotive
description: Dynamic "css in js" without interpolation or language injection
author: zanomate

scripts.build: npm run build:es6 && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:es6: tsc --module es2015 --target es2015 --outDir dist build/emotive.ts && shx mv dist/emotive.js dist/emotive.es6.js
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module es2015 --target es5 --outDir dist build/emotive.ts && shx mv dist/emotive.js dist/emotive.esm.js
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist --declaration --declarationDir dist build/emotive.ts && shx mv dist/emotive.js dist/emotive.cjs.js
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run gen && npm run build
